seo.title: Try the YakShaver MCP Beta!
seo.description: Try the YakShaver MCP Beta! Download, install, and start shaving Yaks today.

tryItNowCards.title: 1. Windows Installer
tryItNowCards.description: Run the installer and follow the on-screen prompts to set up YakShaver.

tryItNowCards.title: 2. Mac Installer
tryItNowCards.description: Open the downloaded file, then drag the YakShaver app into your Applications folder to complete the installation.

tryItNowCards.title: 3. Shave
tryItNowCards.description: Once installed, you can start shaving Yaks! For a detailed rundown, watch the video below.
